Class ESGenericSearchDAO.EsQueryBuilderHelper<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.elasticsearch.mapping.QueryHelper.QueryBuilderHelper
      • alien4cloud.dao.ESGenericSearchDAO.EsQueryBuilderHelper<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IESQueryBuilderHelper, IESSearchQueryBuilderHelper, org.elasticsearch.mapping.QueryHelper.IFilterableQueryBuilderHelper<org.elasticsearch.mapping.QueryHelper.ISearchQueryBuilderHelper>, org.elasticsearch.mapping.QueryHelper.IQueryBuilderHelper<org.elasticsearch.mapping.QueryHelper.ISearchQueryBuilderHelper>, org.elasticsearch.mapping.QueryHelper.ISearchQueryBuilderHelper
    Enclosing class:
    ESGenericSearchDAO

    public class ESGenericSearchDAO.EsQueryBuilderHelper<T>
extends org.elasticsearch.mapping.QueryHelper.QueryBuilderHelper
implements IESSearchQueryBuilderHelper
    Extends the QueryBuilderHelper to provide class based indices and types.

      • find

        public T find()
        Description copied from interface: IESSearchQueryBuilderHelper
        Execute a search query and get a single element or null if no elements can be found. Note that the query may have multiple valid results but only a single one will be returned. Based on the query syntax and sort parameters different results may be returned every time.
        Specified by:
        find in interface IESSearchQueryBuilderHelper
        Returns:
        the first matching instance or null if none can be found.

      • facetedSearch

        public FacetedSearchResult facetedSearch(IAggregationQueryManager aggregationQueryManager)
        Description copied from interface: IESSearchQueryBuilderHelper

        Specified by:
        facetedSearch in interface IESSearchQueryBuilderHelper
        Parameters:
        aggregationQueryManager - The aggregation query manager that manages the query through aggregation.
        Returns:
        The facet search result that contains data from the aggregation as well as other facets.

        Specified by:
        setFilters in interface IESQueryBuilderHelper
        Specified by:

        Parameters:
        filters - The filters to add the the query based on annotation defined filters (as a filtered query).

        current instance.
